message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to us, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. After reviewing the product, I'm still interested in purchasing it, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your needs, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $9,000 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,800. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider a price of $8,900 for the product. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my budget limit. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product. This is my final offer.
